trans-unit.source: "ablockercheck" is a ID which adblocker blocks. So checking it if it is visible you are able to detect if adblocker is turned On.
trans-unit.target: "ablockercheck "是adblocker阻止的ID。所以检查它是否可见,你就能检测到adblocker是否开启了。

trans-unit.source: display:none hides the element, and it does not take up any space;
trans-unit.target: display:none 隐藏元素，并且不占用任何空间；

trans-unit.source: ebdiv should be set to style="display:none;". It works for both show and hide:
trans-unit.target: ebdiv 应该设置为 style="display:none;" 。 它适用于显示和隐藏：

trans-unit.source: opacity:0 hides the element as "visibility:hidden", and it still takes up space in the layout; the only difference is that opacity lets one to make an element partly transparent;
trans-unit.target: opacity:0 将元素隐藏为“ visibility：hidden”，并且仍然占据布局中的空间； 唯一的区别是不透明度使一个元素可以部分透明；

trans-unit.source: visibility:hidden hides the element, but it still takes up space in the layout;
trans-unit.target: visibility:hidden 隐藏元素，但是它仍然占用布局中的空间；

trans-unit.source: An ancestor element is hidden, so the element is not shown on the page.
trans-unit.target: 祖先元素是隐藏的,所以该元素不会在页面上显示。

trans-unit.source: Android 4.4 (Native browser/Chrome/Firefox), Firefox (Windows/Mac), Chrome (Windows/Mac), Opera (Windows Presto/Mac Webkit), Internet Explorer (Internet Explorer 5-11 document modes + Internet Explorer 8 on a virtual machine), Safari (Windows/Mac/iOS)
trans-unit.target: Android 4.4（本机浏览器/ Chrome / Firefox），Firefox（Windows / Mac），Chrome（Windows / Mac），Opera（Windows Presto / Mac Webkit），Internet Explorer（Internet Explorer 5-11文档模式+ Internet Explorer 8 on a虚拟机），Safari（Windows / Mac / iOS）

trans-unit.source: Another answer you should put into consideration is if you are hiding an element, you should use jQuery, but instead of actually hiding it, you remove the whole element, but you copy its HTML content and the tag itself into a jQuery variable, and then all you need to do is test if there is such a tag on the screen, using the normal if (!$('#thetagname').length).
trans-unit.target: 您应该考虑的另一个答案是，如果您要隐藏一个元素，则应使用jQuery ，但是应删除整个元素，而不是实际将其隐藏，而是将其HTML内容和标记本身复制到jQuery变量中，然后您需要做的就是使用正常的 if (!$('#thetagname').length) 测试屏幕上是否存在这样的标签。

trans-unit.source: Because :visible is a jQuery extension and not part of the CSS specification, queries using :visible cannot take advantage of the performance boost provided by the native DOM querySelectorAll() method. To achieve the best performance when using :visible to select elements, first select the elements using a pure CSS selector, then use .filter(":visible").
trans-unit.target: 因为 :visible 是jQuery扩展，而不是CSS规范的一部分，所以使用 :visible 的查询无法利用本机DOM querySelectorAll() 方法提供的性能提升。 为了在使用 :visible 选择元素时达到最佳性能，请首先使用纯CSS选择器选择元素，然后使用 .filter(":visible") 。

trans-unit.source: Because Elements with visibility: hidden or opacity: 0 are considered visible, since they still consume space in the layout (as described for jQuery :visible Selector) - we can check if element is really visible in this way:
trans-unit.target: 因为 Elements with visibility: hidden or opacity: 0 are considered visible, since they still consume space in the layout （如jQuery：visible Selector所述 ）-我们可以通过以下方式检查元素是否真正可见：

trans-unit.target: Blogger Plug n Play-jQuery Tools and Widgets:如何使用jQuery查看元素是否被隐藏或可见?

trans-unit.source: Elements can be considered hidden for several reasons: [...] Their width and height are explicitly set to 0. [...]
trans-unit.target: 元素可以被认为是隐藏的,原因有以下几个。[....]它们的宽度和高度被显式设置为0。

trans-unit.source: Elements with visibility: hidden or opacity: 0 are considered to be visible, since they still consume space in the layout.
trans-unit.target: 具有 visibility: hidden 或 opacity: 0 元素被视为可见，因为它们仍然占用布局中的空间。

trans-unit.source: How element visibility and jQuery works;

trans-unit.source: How do I check if an element is hidden in jQuery
trans-unit.target: 如何检查一个元素是否被隐藏在jQuery中?

trans-unit.source: How to use:
trans-unit.target: 如何使用。

trans-unit.source: How would you test if an element is visible or hidden?
trans-unit.target: 您将如何测试元素是 visible 还是 hidden ？

trans-unit.source: I used this code for each function. Otherwise you can use is(':visible') for checking the visibility of an element.
trans-unit.target: 我为每个功能使用了此代码。 否则，可以使用 is(':visible') 来检查元素的可见性。

trans-unit.source: I would use CSS class .hide { display: none!important; }.
trans-unit.target: 我会使用CSS类 .hide { display: none!important; } } 。

trans-unit.source: If we check for $(this).is(":visible"), jQuery checks for both the things automatically.
trans-unit.target: 如果我们检查 $(this).is(":visible") ，则jQuery会自动检查这两个东西。

trans-unit.source: If you want to check visibility instead of display, you should use: .css("visibility") == "hidden".
trans-unit.target: 如果要检查可见性而不是显示，则应使用： .css("visibility") == "hidden" 。

trans-unit.source: If you're simply acting on an element based on its visibility, you can just include :visible or :hidden in the selector expression. For example:
trans-unit.target: 如果仅基于元素的可见性对其进行操作，则可以在选择器表达式中包括 :visible 或 :hidden 。 例如：

trans-unit.source: Is it possible to toggle the visibility of an element, using the functions .hide(), .show() or .toggle()?
trans-unit.target: 是否可以使用 .show() .toggle() show（）或.toggle（）函数来切换元素的可见性？

trans-unit.source: It's a simple and clear way to check/hide/show elements, if you don't plan to use .toggle() or .animate() methods.
trans-unit.target: 如果您不打算使用 .toggle() 或 .animate() 方法，则这是一种检查/隐藏/显示元素的简单明了的方法。

trans-unit.source: None of these answers address what I understand to be the question, which is what I was searching for, "How do I handle items that have visibility: hidden?". Neither :visible nor :hidden will handle this, as they are both looking for display per the documentation. As far as I could determine, there is no selector to handle CSS visibility. Here is how I resolved it (standard jQuery selectors, there may be a more condensed syntax):
trans-unit.target: 这些答案都没有解决我所理解的问题，即我正在寻找的问题： “如何处理具有 visibility: hidden 项目：隐藏 ？” 。 :visible 和 :hidden 都不会处理这个问题，因为它们都希望根据文档进行显示。 据我所确定，没有选择器可以处理CSS可见性。 这是我的解决方法（标准jQuery选择器，可能会有更简洁的语法）：

trans-unit.source: Notes:
trans-unit.target: Notes:

trans-unit.source: Often when checking if something is visible or not, you are going to go right ahead immediately and do something else with it. jQuery chaining makes this easy.
trans-unit.target: 通常情况下,当你在检查某个东西是否可见时,你会马上去做其他的事情。

trans-unit.source: One can simply use the hidden or visible attribute, like:
trans-unit.target: 可以简单地使用 hidden 或 visible 属性，例如：

trans-unit.source: Or more efficient, but even uglier:
trans-unit.target: 或者更有效率,但更丑陋。

trans-unit.source: Or the following is also the sam, saving the jQuery selector in a variable to have better performance when you need it multiple times:
trans-unit.target: 或者下面也是一样,将jQuery选择器保存在一个变量中,以便在需要多次使用时有更好的性能。

trans-unit.source: Or you can simplify the same with is as follows.
trans-unit.target: 或者您可以如下简化。

trans-unit.source: Same as twernt's suggestion, but applied to a single element; and it matches the algorithm recommended in the jQuery FAQ
trans-unit.target: 与twernt的建议相同，但适用于单个元素。 它与jQuery FAQ中推荐的算法匹配

trans-unit.source: Simply check visibility by checking for a boolean value, like:
trans-unit.target: 只需通过检查一个布尔值来检查可见性,如:。

trans-unit.source: Since the question refers to a single element, this code might be more suitable:
trans-unit.target: 因为这个问题是指单一的元素,所以这个代码可能更适合。

trans-unit.source: So this answer to Stack Overflow question How to check if an element is off-screen should also be considered.
trans-unit.target: 因此，也应考虑对堆栈溢出问题的此答案，即如何检查元素是否在屏幕外 。

trans-unit.source: So if you have a selector and you want to perform some action on it only if is visible or hidden, you can use filter(":visible") or filter(":hidden") followed by chaining it with the action you want to take.
trans-unit.target: 因此，如果您有一个选择器，并且只想在选择器可见或隐藏的情况下对其执行某些操作，则可以使用 filter(":visible") 或 filter(":hidden") 然后将其与您想要的操作链接起来采取。

trans-unit.source: So instead of an if statement, like this:
trans-unit.target: 因此，代替 if 语句，像这样：

trans-unit.source: So this actually makes sense in regards to the box-model and the computed style for the element. Even if width and height are not set explicitly to 0 they may be set implicitly.
trans-unit.target: 因此，这对于盒模型和元素的计算样式实际上是有意义的。 即使没有将width和height 显式设置为0，也可以隐式设置它们。

trans-unit.source: The :visible selector according to the jQuery documentation:
trans-unit.target: :visible 选择器根据jQuery文档 ：

trans-unit.source: The above method will consider div2 visible while :visible not. But the above might be useful in many cases, especially when you need to find if there is any error divs visible in the hidden parent because in such conditions :visible will not work.
trans-unit.target: 上面的方法将 div2 可见，而 :visible 不可见 。 但是以上内容在许多情况下可能很有用，尤其是当您需要查找隐藏的父级中是否存在任何可见的错误div时，因为在这种情况下 :visible 无效。

trans-unit.source: The same JS will then have this output:
trans-unit.target: 那么同样的JS就会有这样的输出。

trans-unit.source: Their width and height are explicitly set to 0.
trans-unit.target: 它们的宽度和高度被明确设置为0。

trans-unit.source: They are form elements with type="hidden".
trans-unit.target: 它们是 type="hidden" 表单元素。

trans-unit.source: They have a CSS display value of none.
trans-unit.target: 它们的CSS display 值为 none 。

trans-unit.source: This is useful in some cases and useless in others, because if you want to check if the element is visible (display != none), ignoring the parents visibility, you will find that doing .css("display") == 'none' is not only faster, but will also return the visibility check correctly.
trans-unit.target: 这在某些情况下很有用，而在其他情况下则没有用，因为如果您要检查元素是否可见（ display != none ），而忽略父级的可见性，则会发现执行 .css("display") == 'none' 不仅速度更快，而且还会正确返回可见性检查。

trans-unit.source: This may work:
trans-unit.target: 这可能是可行的。

trans-unit.source: This seems somewhat counter-intuitive in the first place – though having a closer look at the jQuery documentation gives the relevant information:
trans-unit.target: 首先，这似乎有点违反直觉-尽管仔细查看jQuery文档会提供相关信息：

trans-unit.source: This works for me, and I am using show() and hide() to make my div hidden/visible:
trans-unit.target: 这对我有用，并且我正在使用 show() 和 hide() 使div隐藏/可见：

trans-unit.source: To check if it is not visible I use !:
trans-unit.target: 要检查它是否不可见，我使用 ! ：

trans-unit.source: Use class toggling, not style editing . . .
trans-unit.target: 使用类切换,而不是样式编辑...。

trans-unit.source: Using classes designated for "hiding" elements is easy and also one of the most efficient methods. Toggling a class 'hidden' with a Display style of 'none' will perform faster than editing that style directly. I explained some of this pretty thoroughly in Stack Overflow question Turning two elements visible/hidden in the same div.
trans-unit.target: 使用为“隐藏”元素指定的类很容易，也是最有效的方法之一。 将 Display 样式为“无”的类“隐藏”切换为比直接编辑该样式要快。 我在“堆栈溢出”问题中相当详尽地解释了其中的一些问题，即在同一个div中将两个元素可见/隐藏 。

trans-unit.source: We use jQuery is() to check the selected element with another element, selector or any jQuery object. This method traverses along the DOM elements to find a match, which satisfies the passed parameter. It will return true if there is a match otherwise returns false.
trans-unit.target: 我们使用jQuery is()来检查所选元素与其他元素、选择器或任何jQuery对象的匹配。这个方法会沿着DOM元素遍历,找到一个匹配的元素,满足传递的参数。如果有匹配,它将返回true,否则返回false。

trans-unit.source: When testing an element against :hidden selector in jQuery it should be considered that an absolute positioned element may be recognized as hidden although their child elements are visible.
trans-unit.target: 当针对jQuery中的 :hidden 选择器测试元素时，应考虑将绝对定位的元素识别为隐藏，尽管其子元素可见 。

trans-unit.source: With jQuery 3 the described behavior will change! Elements will be considered visible if they have any layout boxes, including those of zero width and/or height.
trans-unit.target: 在jQuery 3中,所描述的行为将发生改变! 元素将被认为是可见的,如果他们有任何布局框,包括那些零宽度和高度的元素。

trans-unit.source: Working Fiddle
trans-unit.target: 工作中的小提琴

trans-unit.source: Works everywhere
trans-unit.target: 在任何地方都可以使用

trans-unit.source: Works for CSS and inline styles
trans-unit.target: 可用于CSS和内联样式

trans-unit.source: Works for nested elements
trans-unit.target: 可用于嵌套元素

trans-unit.source: You can also do this using plain JavaScript:
trans-unit.target: 你也可以用普通的JavaScript来做。

trans-unit.source: You can determine whether an element is collapsed or not by using the :visible and :hidden selectors.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用 :visible 和 :hidden 选择器来确定元素是否折叠。

trans-unit.source: You can do it all in one line:
trans-unit.target: 一句话就能搞定。

trans-unit.source: You can use the hidden selector:
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用 hidden 选择器：

trans-unit.source: You need to check both... Display as well as visibility:
trans-unit.target: 你需要检查这两点.....显示以及可视性。

trans-unit.source: a) Check if the document is not hidden
trans-unit.target: a)检查文档是否没有隐藏

trans-unit.source: b) Check if an element has zero width / height / opacity or display:none / visibility:hidden in inline styles
trans-unit.target: b）检查元素的宽度/高度/不透明度是否为零或以内联样式 visibility:hidden display:none / 可见性：

trans-unit.source: c) Check if the center (also because it is faster than testing every pixel / corner) of element is not hidden by other element (and all ancestors, example: overflow:hidden / scroll / one element over enother) or screen edges
trans-unit.target: c）检查元素的中心（也因为它比测试每个像素/角要快），是否未被其他元素（和所有祖先，例如： overflow:hidden / scroll / enother上的一个元素）或屏幕边缘隐藏

trans-unit.source: d) Check if an element has zero width / height / opacity or display:none / visibility:hidden in computed styles (among all ancestors)
trans-unit.target: d）检查元素是否具有零宽度/高度/不透明度或以计算样式隐藏（在所有祖先中） display:none /隐藏/可见性：
